# Sprint status report

Execute the **sprint-status** workflow as a **Scrum Master**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_SM.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_SM.md)

## Quick Reference

Generate sprint status:
1. Count stories by status
2. Calculate burndown
3. Identify blockers
4. Report health metrics
